pr_title: EQL: Add ? support (match single char) to wildcard functionality in  `:` operator

timeline.message:
EQL: Add ? character to : operator

Introduce support for ? character to wildcard pattern to : operator and
by transition, to wildcard function.

Fix #65536

timeline.bodyText: Why not defining a list when it's actually needed? Or add one more query. It's a bit too much to use a list for just one query imo. I remember there is one more test like this for * (using a list for one query only).
timeline.author: astefan

timeline.bodyText: Not strictly related to the change, but was wondering the value choice for the escape character (in StringUtils#toLikePattern()). Would \0 have collided with anything?
timeline.author: bpintea

replies.bodyText: 0 ignores escaping, that is no character acts as an escape.
replies.author: costin
